data.text: @wele_kele @JnrBonsu @PrempehNanayaa Well that's a big lie but I'll let it slide

@wele_kele @JnrBonsu @PrempehNanayaa That's your problem if you won't stand for yourself because "he is an elder"
I don't care bruh. If you mess up I'll tell you even if you're an old man

@Ghana_elon_musk @JnrBonsu @PrempehNanayaa You don’t need to say you support it so rise your head high for supporting someone to insult an elderly man like him, my dad didn’t raise me to disrespect elders even behind their back

@Ghana_elon_musk @JnrBonsu @PrempehNanayaa Yes he doesn’t, but his friends, family people who genuinely love and care for him might one day chance upon such comments going through Twitter and let me tell you one thing social media is real life, whatever you post here last forever, so be mindful of your comments
@Ghana_elon_musk @JnrBonsu @PrempehNanayaa At age 77 I wish someone tell you dat into your face and you will see how it feels
